channel.title: Posts on The Mykkanens
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on The Mykkanens

item.title: Ireland Trip Route
item.description: Above is a map of our route in Ireland. We will be in Dublin June 3-6, Kilkeel June 6-8, Belfast June 8-10, Derry & Buncrana June 10-13, then back to Dublin June 13-15.

item.title: Fully Funded!
item.description: God graciously provided 100% of the funds needed for this trip through the gifts of many friends and family. Thank you!

item.title: Support at 80%!
item.description: After posting online, God used the generosity of donors to bring my funding for Ireland from 45% to 80% in a matter of days. I am so very grateful to all who have donated and all who are praying for the rest of the funds to come in and for the trip to have success. I have also made some good contacts in Ireland and have a better idea of when and where I will be meeting with folks.

item.title: Support Update - April
item.description: Thanks to the generosity of many people, I’m 45.86% funded! Praise the Lord for his goodness. Will you join me in praying for God to provide the $2,003 still needed?
